trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso à funcionalidade de um mecanismo de síntese de fala instalado.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um novo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> do objeto, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> para usar uma das vozes fala instalados síntese (texto em fala), use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método e o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis:
trans-unit.target: Essa classe também fornece controle sobre os seguintes aspectos de síntese de fala:

trans-unit.source: To configure the output for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a saída para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar a fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode produzir fala de texto, uma <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto, ou de [linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar e retomar a síntese de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover dicionários, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode usar um ou mais dicionários para orientar sua pronúncia de palavras.

trans-unit.source: To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar a entrega de saída de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera eventos quando ele encontra determinados recursos nos prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Ele também gera eventos de relatório no início (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) e de término (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) de fala operações e sobre a alteração da voz falada (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> do objeto <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and speaks a string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de um aplicativo de console que inicia um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> de objeto e participa de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você inicializa um novo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instância, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> para usar uma das vozes fala instalados síntese (texto em fala), use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método e o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: O local das informações de léxico.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de mídia do léxico.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de tipo de mídia não diferenciam maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um léxico ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: Um léxico pronúncia é uma coleção de palavras ou frases junto com seu pronúncia, que consistem em letras e caracteres de um alfabeto fonético com suporte.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um dicionário para especificar pronúncia personalizada para vocabulário especializado em seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Pronúncia especificada em um arquivo externo léxico têm precedência sobre pronúncia o sintetizador léxico interno ou dicionário.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a pronúncia especificado embutido nos prompts criados com um o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> métodos têm precedência sobre pronúncia especificada em qualquer léxico.

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Pronúncia embutido se aplicam somente a uma única ocorrência de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [dicionários e letras do alfabeto fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter:
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar vários dicionários para um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto. Dois valores são suportados atualmente para o `mediaType` parâmetro:

trans-unit.source: The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: O valor `application/pls+xml` indica que o dicionário está de acordo com o [pronúncia léxico especificação (PLS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Este é o formato preferencial a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: O valor `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indica que o formato de léxico léxico não compactado, que é um formato proprietário da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Este é um formato herdado e é recomendável que você use o formato PLS descrito acima.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the effect of adding and removing a lexicon that contains a custom pronunciation for the word "blue".
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o efeito de adição e remoção de um dicionário que contém uma pronúncia personalizada para a palavra "blue".

trans-unit.source: The lexicon defines the pronunciation of "blue" to sound like "bleep".
trans-unit.target: O dicionário define a pronúncia de "blue" deve soar como "bleep".

trans-unit.source: While the lexicon is loaded, the speech synthesizer uses the pronunciation defined in the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o léxico está carregado, o sintetizador usa a pronúncia definida no léxico.

trans-unit.source: Following are the contents of the lexicon file Blue.pls:
trans-unit.target: Este é o conteúdo do arquivo de dicionário Blue.pls:

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Acionado quando o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera esse evento durante o processamento de um a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar marcadores usando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a prompt that includes two bookmarks and sends the output to a WAV file for playback.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um prompt que inclui os dois indicadores e envia a saída para um arquivo WAV para reprodução.

trans-unit.source: The handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event writes the name of the bookmark and its position in the audio stream when the event was raised to the console.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> evento grava o nome do indicador e sua posição no fluxo de áudio quando o evento foi gerado para o console.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Descarta o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> e libera os recursos usados durante a sessão.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose" /> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Atua como uma proteção para limpar os recursos no caso em que o método <see cref="M:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose" /> não é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o prompt de que o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> está falando.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto de prompt que está sendo falado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that are currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de vozes de síntese de fala (conversão de texto em fala) que estão atualmente instaladas no sistema.

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices (engines for text-to-speech) it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo chama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, o método verifica que cada uma das vozes (mecanismos para texto em fala) encontrados na atende registro certos critérios mínimos.

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer falha de verificação, voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> define seu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> propriedade `False`.

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo não é possível selecionar uma voz cujo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> é de propriedade `False`.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os aplicativos não configuram uma voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Retorna todas as vozes de síntese (conversão de texto em fala) de fala instalados.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura das vozes atualmente instaladas no sistema.

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Uma voz é um mecanismo de síntese de fala (texto em fala ou TTS) que é instalado no sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and outputs to the console a list of the installed voices (engines for speech synthesis) and demonstrates the information that is available for each voice.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de um aplicativo de console que inicia um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> do objeto e saídas para o console de uma lista das vozes instaladas (mecanismos de síntese de fala) e demonstra as informações que estão disponíveis para cada tipo de voz.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: A localidade a que a voz deve dar suporte.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Retorna todas as vozes de sintetização de fala (conversão de texto em fala) instaladas que dão suporte a uma localidade específica.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura das vozes instaladas atualmente no sistema que dão suporte a uma localidade específica.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver suporte vozes instaladas a localidade especificada, esse método retorna uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar usando o idioma especificado na propriedade de cultura de texto em fala, um mecanismo de síntese de fala que dá suporte a esse código de país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes:
trans-unit.target: Os mecanismos de síntese de fala fornecido com o Microsoft Windows 7 trabalhar com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma:

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos)

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China)

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (Taiwan)

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma de duas letras, como "en" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and outputs to the console a list of the installed voices that support the en-US locale.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de um aplicativo de console que inicia um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> de objeto e saídas para o console de uma lista das vozes instaladas que dão suporte a localidade en-US.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Pausa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Acionado quando um fonema é alcançado.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: Um phoneme é um componente básico do idioma escrito, normalmente uma carta de uma letra (ou uma combinação de duas letras) que representa um ou mais sons distintos.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter "c" is a phoneme that may sound like "s" in "cinder", or like "k" in "catch".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a letra "c" é um phoneme que pode parecer como "s" em "concreto", ou "k" em "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Uma palavra de escrita é um assemblage de fonemas.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Alterar um phoneme em uma palavra alterará a ortografia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instância gera um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> evento para cada parte de uma palavra que constitui um phoneme.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word "theme" would generate three <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> events; one for the "th" sound, one for the "e" sound, and one for the "m" sound (me).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a palavra "tema" produziria três <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> eventos; para o som "th", um para o som "e" e um para o som "m" (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo e informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a taxa de fala do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a taxa de fala do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, que vai de -10 a 10.

trans-unit.source: The following example speaks a string with the speaking rate set to -2.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz uma cadeia de caracteres com a taxa de fala definida como -2.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: O local do documento léxico.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove um léxico do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Para ver um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Retoma o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> depois que ele está em pausa.

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: O nome da voz a ser selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona uma voz específica por nome.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe para obter os nomes dos instalado vozes de texto em fala (TTS) que você pode selecionar.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar uma voz, passar todo o conteúdo do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> propriedade como argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto seleciona a primeira voz instalada que contém `name` a voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> executa uma comparação de subcadeia de caracteres diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas, para determinar se a voz corresponde a `name`.

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo chama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, o método verifica que cada uma das vozes encontrar no registro atenda a certos critérios mínimo.

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer falha de verificação, voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> define seu <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> propriedade `False`.

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo não é possível selecionar uma voz cujo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> é de propriedade `False`.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, os aplicativos não configuram uma voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar uma voz por gênero, idade ou localidade, use uma da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with specific characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona uma voz com características específicas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe para obter os nomes dos instalado vozes de texto em fala (TTS) que você pode selecionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that matches the specified characteristics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto seleciona a primeira voz instalada que correspondem às características especificadas.

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto seleciona a voz instalada primeiro cujo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> propriedades correspondem a `gender` e `age` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The position of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: A posição da voz a ser selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender and age, based on the position in which the voices are ordered.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona uma voz com um sexo e idade específicos, com base na posição na qual as vozes são ordenadas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto encontra instalada expressa cujo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> propriedades correspondem a `gender` e `age` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> conta as correspondências encontradas e retorna a voz quando a contagem é igual a `voiceAlternate` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o texto em fala, usando o idioma especificado no `culture` parâmetro, um mecanismo de síntese de fala que dá suporte a que o código do país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes:
trans-unit.target: Os mecanismos de síntese de fala fornecido com o Microsoft Windows 7 trabalhar com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma:

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos)

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China)

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (Taiwan)

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma de duas letras, como "en" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
