trans-unit.target: Para selecionar uma voz por nome, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo ao qual a saída de síntese será acrescentada.

trans-unit.source: The format to use for the synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: O formato a ser usado para a saída da síntese.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para acrescentar a saída a um fluxo de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> para liberar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>da referência ao fluxo.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter outras opções de configuração de saída, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to send output to the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para enviar a saída para o dispositivo de áudio padrão.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Sound** window in the Windows **Control Panel** to configure the default audio device for the computer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o **som** janela nas janelas **painel de controle** para configurar o dispositivo de áudio padrão do computador.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter outras opções de configuração de saída, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the synthesizer to speak a phrase to the default audio output.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o sintetizador Fale uma frase para a saída de áudio padrão.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to not send output from synthesis operations to a device, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para não enviar a saída de operações de síntese para um dispositivo, arquivo ou fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ‘s reference to a file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para liberar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> da referência a um arquivo ou fluxo.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Para ver um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter outras opções de configuração de saída, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para acrescentar a saída a um arquivo de formato de áudio de forma de onda.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the file, reconfigure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>da referência para o arquivo, reconfigure o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>da saída, por exemplo, chamando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter outras opções de configuração de saída, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a file that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para acrescentar a saída a um arquivo que contém o áudio do formato Waveform.

trans-unit.source: To configure the output and specify the audio format, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a saída e especificar o formato de áudio, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an instance of <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> to play a prompt that has been output to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma instância de <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> para reproduzir um prompt que tenha sido a saída para um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> call is asynchronous, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instance is created (and the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> method invoked) in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> chamada é assíncrona, o <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instância é criada (e o <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> método invocado) no manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The audio format information.
trans-unit.target: As informações de formato de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file in a specified format.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para acrescentar a saída a um arquivo de formato de áudio de forma de onda em um formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the format of the output of speech synthesis and sends it to a WAV file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir especifica o formato da saída do sintetizador de voz e os envia para um arquivo WAV.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo ao qual a saída de síntese será acrescentada.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a stream that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura o objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para acrescentar a saída a um fluxo que contém o áudio em formato de forma de onda.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream, reconfigure the synthesizer's output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>da referência para o fluxo, reconfigure o sintetizador saída, por exemplo, chamando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter outras opções de configuração de saída, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs a phrase to a WAV stream.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir gera uma frase em um fluxo WAV.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Gera a saída de fala de forma síncrona de uma cadeia de caracteres, um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> ou um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos geram fala de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: The methods do not return until the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instance has been completely spoken.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos não retornará até que o conteúdo do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instância foi falada completamente.

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest way to generate speech.
trans-unit.target: Essa é a maneira mais simples para gerar a fala.

trans-unit.source: However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method to generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se seu aplicativo precisa executar tarefas enquanto fala, por exemplo texto de realce, animação de pintura, controles do monitor ou outras tarefas, usam o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> métodos ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método para gerar fala de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para esse método, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode disparar os eventos a seguir:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado de falando do sintetizador é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador começa a geração de fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez que o sintetizador atinge uma letra ou uma combinação de letras que constituem um som discreto de fala em um idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez o sintetizador conclui falando de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez saída de fala requer uma alteração na posição da boca ou os músculos faciais usados para produzir a fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando a voz falada o sintetizador de alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> não gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos durante o processamento de um a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fala assincronamente o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De forma assíncrona falar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> de objeto, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto a partir de uma cadeia de caracteres e passa o objeto como um argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fala assincronamente o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De forma assíncrona falar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> de objeto, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto a partir de uma cadeia de caracteres e passa o objeto como um argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: O texto para falar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: Fala assincronamente o conteúdo de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale sincronicamente uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale assincronamente o conteúdo de uma cadeia de caracteres, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método proporciona a forma mais simples de gerar saída de forma síncrona de fala.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Gera a saída de fala de forma assíncrona de uma cadeia de caracteres, um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> ou um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> métodos geram fala de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> object to finish speaking.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos retornam imediatamente sem esperar que o conteúdo de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> objeto para terminar de falar.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> se seu aplicativo precisa para executar tarefas enquanto fala, realce o texto por exemplo, pintar animação, controles de monitor ou outras tarefas.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para esse método, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode disparar os eventos a seguir:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado de falando do sintetizador é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador começa a geração de fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez que o sintetizador atinge uma letra ou uma combinação de letras que constituem um som discreto de fala em um idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez o sintetizador conclui falando de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez saída de fala requer uma alteração na posição da boca ou os músculos faciais usados para produzir a fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando a voz falada o sintetizador de alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador termina um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operação.

trans-unit.source: If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não precisa executar tarefas enquanto fala, você pode usar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método para gerar fala de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fala o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar a fala assíncrona de um prompt com o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De forma síncrona falar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> de objeto, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto a partir de uma cadeia de caracteres e passa o objeto como um argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fala o conteúdo de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto que contém o conteúdo para fala.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: De forma síncrona falar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> de objeto, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto a partir de uma cadeia de caracteres e passa o objeto como um argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: O texto para falar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: Fala assincronamente o conteúdo de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto que contém o conteúdo para fala.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale assincronamente uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale sincronicamente o conteúdo de uma cadeia de caracteres, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar a fala assíncrona de um prompt com o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguir, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método proporciona a forma mais simples de gerar saída assíncrona de fala.

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para o qual uma operação de fala é cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de síntese assíncrona de um prompt na fila.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following:
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar esse método para cancelar assíncrona fala operação para o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de um <xref:System.String> especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de um <xref:System.String> contendo SSML especificado por um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, Speech cria um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> de objeto popula com o conteúdo do parâmetro do método e retorna o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Se você manter uma cópia do retornado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, você pode passar na <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> Cancelar falado conteúdo especificado em um <xref:System.String> ou um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Cancela todas as operações na fila, assíncronas e de sintetização de voz.

trans-unit.source: The following example show a use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> to cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt, so that a new prompt can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um uso de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> Cancelar falando assíncrona de um prompt para que um novo prompt pode ser dita.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event fires when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento é acionado quando um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operação foi cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> conclui a fala com base em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento após a conclusão de qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> classe não tem propriedades e não retorna dados a partir de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é fornecido para habilitar os autores de aplicativos escrever manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado depois que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> fala cada palavra individual de um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera esse evento para cada nova palavra que ele está disponível em um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os dados associados ao evento e um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The SSML string to speak.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres SSML a ser falada.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Fala de forma síncrona uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém marcação SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do `textToSpeak` parâmetro deve incluir um `speak` elemento e deve estar de acordo com o [linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [referência de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale assincronamente uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> para iniciar o síncrona falando de uma cadeia de caracteres que não contêm marcação SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para esse método, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode disparar os eventos a seguir:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado de falando do sintetizador é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador começa a geração de fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez que o sintetizador atinge uma letra ou uma combinação de letras que constituem um som discreto de fala em um idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez o sintetizador conclui falando de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez saída de fala requer uma alteração na posição da boca ou os músculos faciais usados para produzir a fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando a voz falada o sintetizador de alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> não gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos durante o processamento de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example renders the date 1/29/2009 as a date, in month, day, year order.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir renderiza a data 1/29/2009, como uma data, mês, dia, ordem de ano.

trans-unit.source: The SMML markup to speak.
trans-unit.target: A marcação SMML para falar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Fala de forma síncrona uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém marcação SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do `textToSpeak` parâmetro deve incluir um `speak` elemento e deve estar de acordo com o [linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala (SSML) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [referência de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Fale sincronicamente uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> to initiate the asynchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> para iniciar o assíncrona falando de uma cadeia de caracteres que não contêm marcação SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para esse método, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> pode disparar os eventos a seguir:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado de falando do sintetizador é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador começa a geração de fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez que o sintetizador atinge uma letra ou uma combinação de letras que constituem um som discreto de fala em um idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez o sintetizador conclui falando de uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Aumenta cada vez saída de fala requer uma alteração na posição da boca ou os músculos faciais usados para produzir a fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador encontra um indicador em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando a voz falada o sintetizador de alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes processing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o sintetizador termina o processamento um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operação.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se não precisam dos seus aplicativos executar tarefas enquanto fala, você pode usar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método para gerar fala de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> começa a falar com base em um prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera esse evento quando ele inicia o processamento de um prompt usando qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> classe não tem propriedades e não retorna dados a partir de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Ele é fornecido para habilitar os autores de aplicativos escrever manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado de atual de fala do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o estado atual de fala do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o novo estado do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> depois que ele for alterado, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> before, during, and after speaking a prompt.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o estado do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> antes, durante e após a fala de um prompt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Gerado quando o estado do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> gera esse evento quando seu falando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> alterações.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os dados associados ao evento e um exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar e retomar a síntese de fala, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Acionado quando um visema é alcançado.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Um viseme é a posição básica da boca e face ao pronunciar uma phoneme.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes são representações visuais dos fonemas.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Speech suporta 21 visemes para inglês (EUA), cada um dos quais corresponde a um ou mais fonemas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> eventos são gerados quando um novo phoneme atingido tem um viseme correspondente diferente que o anterior phoneme atingido.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Como alguns visemes representam mais de um phoneme, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> evento não será gerado se o próximo phoneme atingido corresponde para o mesmo viseme como o phoneme anterior.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para as palavras faladas "Esta zona", um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> é gerado para o "s" em "this" e "z" em "zone".

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this".
trans-unit.target: No entanto, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> evento não é gerado para a "z" em "zone" porque ele corresponde do viseme mesmo como o "s" em "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir é uma lista de 21 fonemas SAPI e grupos de phoneme que correspondem a um viseme em inglês (EUA).

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre dados associados a `VisemeReached` evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre a voz atual do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre a voz atual do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando você inicializa um novo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, ele usa a voz do sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto para usar um das vozes de síntese de fala instalado, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método e o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> and gets information about the current voice.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir inicializa uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> e obtém informações sobre a voz atual.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Acionado quando a voz do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo e informações sobre os dados associados ao evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar a voz que o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> usa qualquer o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> métodos ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o volume de saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o volume do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, de 0 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the volume of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s audio output for the synthesized voice and the WAV file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o volume do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>da saída de áudio para a voz sintetizada e o arquivo WAV.
